verses.verse: Then Jonah <S%H3124><s%> prayed <S%H6419><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> his God <S%H430><s%> out of the fish's <S%H1710><s%> belly, <S%H4578><s%>

And said, <S%H559><s%> I cried <S%H7121><s%> by reason of my affliction <S%H6869><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and he heard <S%H6030><s%> me; out of the belly <S%H990><s%> of hell <S%H7585><s%> cried <S%H7768><s%> I, and you heard <S%H8085><s%> my voice. <S%H6963><s%>

For you had cast <S%H7993><s%> me into the deep, <S%H4688><s%> in the middle <S%H3824><s%> of the seas; <S%H3220><s%> and the floods <S%H5104><s%> compassed <S%H5437><s%> me about: all <S%H3605><s%> your billows <S%H4867><s%> and your waves <S%H1530><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> me.

Then I said, <S%H559><s%> I am cast <S%H1644><s%> out of your sight; <S%H5869><s%> yet <S%H389><s%> I will look <S%H5027><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> your holy <S%H6944><s%> temple. <S%H1964><s%>

The waters <S%H4325><s%> compassed <S%H661><s%> me about, even to the soul: <S%H5315><s%> the depth <S%H8415><s%> closed <S%H5437><s%> me round <S%H5437><s%> about, the weeds <S%H5488><s%> were wrapped <S%H2280><s%> about my head. <S%H7218><s%>

I went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the bottoms <S%H7095><s%> of the mountains; <S%H2022><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> with her bars <S%H1280><s%> was about <S%H1157><s%> me for ever: <S%H5769><s%> yet have you brought <S%H5927><s%> up my life <S%H2416><s%> from corruption, <S%H7845><s%> O LORD <S%H3068><s%> my God. <S%H430><s%>

When my soul <S%H5315><s%> fainted <S%H5848><s%> within <S%H5921><s%> me I remembered <S%H2142><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and my prayer <S%H8605><s%> came <S%H935><s%> in to you, into <S%H413><s%> your holy <S%H6944><s%> temple. <S%H1964><s%>
They that observe <S%H8104><s%> lying <S%H7723><s%> vanities <S%H1892><s%> forsake <S%H5800><s%> their own mercy. <S%H2617><s%>

But I will sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to you with the voice <S%H6963><s%> of thanksgiving; <S%H8426><s%> I will pay <S%H7999><s%> that that I have vowed. <S%H5087><s%> Salvation <S%H3444><s%> is of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to the fish, <S%H1709><s%> and it vomited <S%H6958><s%> out Jonah <S%H3124><s%> on the dry <S%H3004><s%> land. <S%H3004><s%>
